_header: Our Lord that all mights may
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ; mercy
_description: A prayer to Christ for mercy — two 4-line monorhyming stanzas with medial rhyme, or 8-line stanzas, abababab; probably incomplete since at end of a MS fragment

CULAdd2585b.First Lines:
Ur lauerd þat alle michtes mayIn euen and erthe þi wille
                    þu maIchaf ben tint sin maniadayAnd ar and late has bene þi
                    sa…
CULAdd2585b.Last Lines:
With al mi witte ic af it wrochtI knaw me for þe werst of
                    all
CULAdd2585b.Editions:
Heffernan,  Thomas J. 
             “Four Middle English Lyrics from the Thirteenth Century.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         43 (1981): 131-50: 150.
